desktopSettings.title: Desktop Settings
desktopSettings.notAvailable: These settings are only available in the desktop app
desktopSettings.downloadHint: Download the desktop app to access native features like system notifications, global shortcuts, and automatic updates.
desktopSettings.enableNotificationsDesc: Receive desktop notifications for important events
desktopSettings.notificationsEnabledBody: You will now receive desktop notifications.
desktopSettings.testNotificationBody: This is a test notification from Cognia.
desktopSettings.updatesDesc: Check for and install app updates
desktopSettings.latestVersion: You are on the latest version
desktopSettings.enableSelectionToolbarDesc: Show AI toolbar when selecting text in any application

proxySettings.title: Proxy
proxySettings.description: Configure network proxy for all requests. Auto-detect Clash, V2Ray, and other proxy software.
proxySettings.notAvailable: Proxy settings are only available in the desktop app.
proxySettings.notAvailableDesc: Download the desktop app to configure network proxy.
proxySettings.proxyModeDesc: Choose how to configure the network proxy.
proxySettings.modeAutoDesc: Automatically detect running proxy software like Clash, V2Ray
proxySettings.modeManualDesc: Manually configure proxy server address and port
proxySettings.detectedProxiesDesc: Proxy software detected on your system.
proxySettings.noProxiesFoundDesc: Make sure Clash, V2Ray or other proxy software is running.
proxySettings.testProxyDesc: Verify the proxy connection is working.

environmentSettings.title: Environment
environmentSettings.description: Install and manage development environment tools for Python, Node.js, and container runtimes.
environmentSettings.notAvailable: Environment management is only available in the desktop app.
environmentSettings.notAvailableDesc: Download the desktop app to install and manage development tools.
environmentSettings.languageManagersDesc: Tools for managing programming language versions and packages.
environmentSettings.containerRuntimesDesc: Container engines for running isolated applications.
environmentSettings.mediaToolsDesc: Tools for audio and video processing.
environmentSettings.confirmInstallDesc: This will download and install {tool} on your system.
environmentSettings.installWarning: Installation may require administrator privileges and could take a few minutes.

virtualEnv.title: Virtual Environments
virtualEnv.description: Create and manage Python virtual environments for isolated development.
virtualEnv.notAvailable: Virtual environment management requires the desktop app.
virtualEnv.createEnvironmentDesc: Create a new Python virtual environment with your preferred settings.
virtualEnv.packagesHint: Comma-separated list of packages to install
virtualEnv.confirmDeleteDesc: This will permanently delete the virtual environment and all its packages. This action cannot be undone.
